mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO NAG_CUSTOMER ( CM_NAME , CM_PHONENUMBER , CM_ISINPOOL , CM_DATAPOOLID , CM_DATASOUCE , CM_DATAMMARK , CM_STRING20 , CM_DATE1 ) VALUES ( #{cmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmPhonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmIsinpool,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cmDatapoolid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cmDatasouce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmDatammark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmString20,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
)
mapper.select: SELECT CM_ID as "cmId" , CM_NAME as "cmName" , CM_PHONENUMBER as "cmPhonenumber" , CM_TEL1 as "cmTel1" , CM_TEL2 as "cmTel2" , CM_FAX as "cmFax" , CM_CREATEBY as "cmCreateby" , CM_CREATEDATE as "cmCreatedate" , CM_MODIFIEDBY as "cmModifiedby" , CM_MODIFIEDDATE as "cmModifieddate" , CM_LASTCALLBY as "cmLastcallby" , CM_LASTCALLDATE as "cmLastcalldate" , CM_LASTCALLRESULT as "cmLastcallresult" , CM_LASTCALLSUMMARY as "cmLastcallsummary" , CM_HOLDER as "cmHolder" , CM_HOLDERPART as "cmHolderpart" , CM_POSTCODE as "cmPostcode" , CM_ADDRESS as "cmAddress" , CM_INDUSTRY as "cmIndustry" , CM_GRADE as "cmGrade" , CM_TYPE as "cmType" , CM_WEBURL as "cmWeburl" , CM_EMAIL as "cmEmail" , CM_ISDELETE as "cmIsdelete" , CM_ISLOCK as "cmIslock" , CM_ISFORBIDCALL as "cmIsforbidcall" , CM_BROWSETIMES as "cmBrowsetimes" , CM_ISINPOOL as "cmIsinpool" , CM_DATAPOOLID as "cmDatapoolid" , CM_DATASOUCE as "cmDatasouce" , CM_DATAMMARK as "cmDatammark" , CM_STRING1 as "cmNumber6" , CM_DATE1 as "cmDate1" , CM_DATE2 as "cmDate2" , CM_DATE3 as "cmDate3" , CM_DATE4 as "cmDate4" , CM_DATE5 as "cmDate5" , CM_COMMENT1 as "cmComment1" , CM_COMMENT2 as "cmComment2" , CM_COMMENT3 as "cmComment3" , CM_COMMENT4 as "cmComment4" , CM_COMMENT5 as "cmComment5" , CM_HOLDERID as "cmHolderid" , CM_DELUSER as "cmDeluser" , CM_DELTIME as "cmDeltime" , CM_DIALNUM as "cmDialnum" , CM_TATOLCALLOUTLEN as "cmTatolcalloutlen" , CM_ALLOCDATE as "cmAllocdate" , CM_ALLOCDAYNUM as "cmAllocdaynum" , CM_CALLOUTANSWERNUM as "cmCalloutanswernum" , CM_TATOLCALLINLEN as
